patched_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: prod1
  labels:
    app: prod1
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prod1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: prod1
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: prod1-container
        image: paulfdunn/prod1:v0.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/prod1/data
          name: data
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: prod1-pvc

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kctl
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kctl
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kctl
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: kctl
        image: kg8s-local/kctl:v21.12.1
        command:
        - sh
        args:
        - -c
        - 'cat /opt/ca.crt

          cp /opt/ca.crt /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/nip-io-ca.crt

          update-ca-certificates

          echo ""

          echo "[UPDATE CA CERTIFICATE] check ca certificates"

          tail -n 20 /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt

          echo $(date) ; tail -f /dev/null

          '
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: '1'
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: cm-ca-nip
          mountPath: /opt/ca.crt
          subPath: ca.crt
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: cm-ca-nip
        configMap:
          name: ca-nip

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kctl
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kctl
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kctl
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: kctl
        image: kg8s-local/kctl:v21.12.1
        command:
        - sh
        args:
        - -c
        - 'cat /opt/ca.crt

          cp /opt/ca.crt /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/nip-io-ca.crt

          update-ca-certificates

          echo ""

          echo "[UPDATE CA CERTIFICATE] check ca certificates"

          tail -n 20 /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt

          echo $(date) ; tail -f /dev/null

          '
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: '1'
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: cm-ca-nip
          mountPath: /opt/ca.crt
          subPath: ca.crt
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: cm-ca-nip
        configMap:
          name: ca-nip

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: guestbook
      tier: frontend
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: guestbook
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: php-redis
        image: naoyoshi/mb-ui:stable
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        env:
        - name: GET_HOSTS_FROM
          value: dns
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: server
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auto-deploy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auto-deploy
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: server
        image: gcr.io/kubeflow-ci/auto_deploy:stable
        command:
        - python
        - -m
        - kubeflow.testing.auto_deploy.server
        - serve
        - --template-folder=/app/templates
        - --deployments-dir=/cache/deployments
        - --port=80
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 2
            memory: 8Gi
        workingDir: /app
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /app/config
        - name: cache
          mountPath: /cache
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      - name: reconciler
        image: gcr.io/kubeflow-ci/auto_deploy:stable
        command:
        - python
        - -m
        - kubeflow.testing.auto_deploy.reconciler
        - run
        - --config-path=/app/config/deployments.yaml
        - --job-template-path=/app/config/deploy-kubeflow.yaml
        - --local-dir=/cache/auto_deploy_src
        - --deployments-dir=/cache/deployments
        env:
        - name: JOB_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 2
            memory: 8Gi
        workingDir: /app
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /app/config
        - name: cache
          mountPath: /cache
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      serviceAccount: default-editor
      volumes:
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: config
      - name: cache
        emptyDir: {}

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: load-balancer-example
  name: hello-world
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: load-balancer-example
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: load-balancer-example
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nikhil101/django-k8s:2.1
        name: hello-world
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-3665
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-3665
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    securityContext:
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-3665
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    securityContext:
      runAsNonRoot: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-3665
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
